    • Method Detail

      • radialShadow

        public void radialShadow​(int rate)
        Adds a radial shadow that gets darker the farther a pixel is from the upper left corner.
        Parameters:
        rate - The speed at which the shadow gets darker, where a larger number produces a more gradual shadow

      • radialGlow

        public void radialGlow​(int rate)
        Adds a radial glow that gets brighter the farther a pixel is from the bottom right corner.
        Parameters:
        rate - The speed at which the shadow gets lighter, where a larger number produces a more gradual glow
